task_description: Facing the building to your East (approx. 97°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the top of the building to estimate its height, so I will look up.
My heading has been reset to North, so I need to turn right to face the building again, which is located to the East at approximately 97 degrees.
I am currently looking down at the building; to see its full height, I need to look up towards the roof.
My heading has been reset to North again, so I need to rotate right to face the building at 97 degrees East while maintaining an upward pitch to see the top.
I am looking down at the building; to estimate its height, I need to look up to see the roof.
My heading has been reset to North again; I need to rotate to face the building at 97 degrees East while maintaining an upward pitch to see the top.
I need to see the top of the building to estimate its height, so I will look up.
My heading has been reset to North again; I need to rotate right by 97 degrees to face the building while maintaining my upward pitch to see the top.
I need to see the top of the building to estimate its height, so I will look up.
I can now see the top of the building; it appears to be about 6-7 stories tall, and assuming a standard floor height of 3.5 meters, I estimate the total height to be around 24 meters.
